content:
TITLE: Custom Error Definitions
DESCRIPTION: Custom error definitions for common token operation failures like overflow, underflow, and insufficient balances.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc20.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
error TotalSupplyOverflow()
error AllowanceOverflow()
error AllowanceUnderflow()
error InsufficientBalance()
error InsufficientAllowance()
error InvalidPermit()
error PermitExpired()
error Permit2AllowanceIsFixedAtInfinity()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing nonReadReentrant Modifier in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Modifier that protects view functions from read-only reentrancy attacks.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/reentrancyguardtransient.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
modifier nonReadReentrant() virtual
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Solady with npm for Hardhat or Truffle
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Solady using npm for Hardhat or Truffle projects. This snippet demonstrates how to add Solady as a dependency in Node.js-based Ethereum development environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/overview.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install solady
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing fullMulDiv Function for Full Precision Multiplication and Division in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Implements the fullMulDiv function, which calculates floor(x * y / d) with full precision. It throws if the result overflows a uint256 or when d is zero.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/fixedpointmathlib.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function fullMulDiv(uint256 x, uint256 y, uint256 d)
    internal
    pure
    returns (uint256 z)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Multicall Function in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: This function allows multiple method calls on the contract itself using delegatecall. It takes an array of calldata and returns an array of encoded results. If any delegatecall reverts, the entire transaction is reverted.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/multicallable.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Solidity
CODE:
```
function multicall(bytes[] calldata data)
    public
    payable
    virtual
    returns (bytes[] memory)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing ECDSA Signature Recovery in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Recovers the signer's address from a message digest hash and signature. Supports both standard and EIP-2098 short-form signatures.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/ecdsa.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function recover(bytes32 hash, bytes memory signature)
    internal
    view
    returns (address result)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: String Storage Operations
DESCRIPTION: Core functions for manipulating string storage including setting, clearing, and retrieving values.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libstring.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function set(StringStorage storage $, string memory s) internal
```

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function clear(StringStorage storage $) internal
```

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function get(StringStorage storage $)
    internal
    view
    returns (string memory)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Group Sum for Bytes32 Keys
DESCRIPTION: Sorts and uniquifies bytes32 keys array while updating the corresponding values array with grouped sums by key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libsort.md#2025-04-16_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function groupSum(bytes32[] memory keys, uint256[] memory values)
    internal
    pure
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Core Internal Transfer Function in ERC6909
DESCRIPTION: Handles the core logic for token transfers, including authorization checks. This function powers both direct transfers and delegated transfers, and handles special cases for allowance management.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc6909.md#2025-04-16_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function _transfer(
    address by,
    address from,
    address to,
    uint256 id,
    uint256 amount
) internal virtual
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deploying ERC1967 Proxy with Immutable Arguments in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: This function deploys an ERC1967 proxy with a specified implementation and immutable arguments. It allows for more complex proxy setups.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function deployERC1967(address implementation, bytes memory args)
    internal
    returns (address instance)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Internal Token Operation Functions
DESCRIPTION: Internal functions for minting, burning, and transferring tokens with hooks for customization.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc20.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function _mint(address to, uint256 amount) internal virtual
function _burn(address from, uint256 amount) internal virtual
function _transfer(address from, address to, uint256 amount) internal virtual
function _approve(address owner, address spender, uint256 amount) internal virtual
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Array Manipulation Functions in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Creates functions for array operations such as truncate, free, hash, slice, copy, contains, and indexOf.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/dynamicarraylib.md#2025-04-16_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function truncate(uint256[] memory a, uint256 n)
    internal
    pure
    returns (uint256[] memory result)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Batch Execution Function for ERC6551 Account
DESCRIPTION: Executes a sequence of calls from the account using the Call struct array. This batch variant provides efficiency when multiple operations need to be executed in a single transaction.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/accounts/erc6551.md#2025-04-16_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function executeBatch(Call[] calldata calls, uint8 operation)
    public
    payable
    virtual
    onlyValidSigner
    returns (bytes[] memory results)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Computing Contract Deployment Address with CREATE Opcode in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Function to predict the address where a contract will be deployed using the CREATE opcode based on the deployer's address and nonce. Implements RLP encoding according to Ethereum Yellow Paper specifications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/librlp.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function computeAddress(address deployer, uint256 nonce)
    internal
    pure
    returns (address deployed)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: ERC721 Safe Transfer Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Safely transfers a token between addresses with additional data parameter and validation checks.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc721.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function safeTransferFrom(
    address from,
    address to,
    uint256 id,
    bytes calldata data
) public payable virtual
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Execute Operation Function for ERC6551 Account
DESCRIPTION: Executes a call from the account with support for multiple operation types (CALL, DELEGATECALL, CREATE, CREATE2). Only valid signers can execute operations, and errors are bubbled up if the operation fails.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/accounts/erc6551.md#2025-04-16_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function execute(
    address target,
    uint256 value,
    bytes calldata data,
    uint8 operation
) public payable virtual onlyValidSigner returns (bytes memory result)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deploying Deterministic ERC1967I Proxy with Value and Arguments
DESCRIPTION: Deploys a deterministic ERC1967I proxy with implementation, arguments, and salt, while depositing ETH. Combines deterministic address creation, argument storage, and funding in a single operation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_28

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function deployDeterministicERC1967I(
    uint256 value,
    address implementation,
    bytes memory args,
    bytes32 salt
) internal returns (address instance)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deploying Deterministic Clone with Immutable Arguments in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: This function deploys a deterministic clone of an implementation contract with immutable arguments and a salt. It returns the address of the deployed instance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function cloneDeterministic(
    uint256 value,
    address implementation,
    bytes memory args,
    bytes32 salt
) internal returns (address instance)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Making Gas-Limited Contract Calls with Value in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Function that makes a call with specified gas limit and capped return data copying. Returns success status, whether the return data exceeded the copy limit, and the result data. Useful for preventing out-of-gas errors in the calling contract.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libcall.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function tryCall(
    address target,
    uint256 value,
    uint256 gasStipend,
    uint16 maxCopy,
    bytes memory data
)
    internal
    returns (bool success, bool exceededMaxCopy, bytes memory result)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Minimal Proxy Operations in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Defines a set of functions for deploying and managing minimal proxies. These functions include methods for creating clones, deterministic clones, and generating initialization code for proxies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function clone(address implementation)
    internal
    returns (address instance)

function clone(uint256 value, address implementation)
    internal
    returns (address instance)

function cloneDeterministic(address implementation, bytes32 salt)
    internal
    returns (address instance)

function cloneDeterministic(
    uint256 value,
    address implementation,
    bytes32 salt
) internal returns (address instance)

function initCode(address implementation)
    internal
    pure
    returns (bytes memory c)

function initCodeHash(address implementation)
    internal
    pure
    returns (bytes32 hash)

function predictDeterministicAddress(
    address implementation,
    bytes32 salt,
    address deployer
) internal pure returns (address predicted)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deploying Minimal ERC1967 Proxy in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: This function deploys a minimal ERC1967 proxy with a specified implementation. It's designed for use with UUPS upgradeable contracts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function deployERC1967(address implementation)
    internal
    returns (address instance)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: StringStorage Struct Definition
DESCRIPTION: A gas-optimized string storage struct that packs length with first 31 bytes if <255 bytes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libstring.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
struct StringStorage {
    bytes32 _spacer;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deploying ERC1967I Proxy with Arguments
DESCRIPTION: Deploys a minimal ERC1967I proxy with the specified implementation and immutable arguments. The arguments are stored in the proxy and can be accessed by the implementation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_25

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function deployERC1967I(address implementation, bytes memory args)
    internal
    returns (address)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing int256 Array Shuffling Function in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Shuffles an int256 array in-place using the Fisher-Yates algorithm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libprng.md#2025-04-16_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function shuffle(PRNG memory prng, int256[] memory a) internal pure
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing nonReadReentrant Modifier in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Defines a modifier that guards a view function from read-only reentrancy. This modifier can be applied to view functions to prevent read-only reentrancy attacks.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/reentrancyguard.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: Solidity
CODE:
```
modifier nonReadReentrant() virtual
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Predicting Deterministic Address for Contract Deployment in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Calculates the deterministic address of a contract deployment given the initialization code hash, salt, and deployer address. The returned address has dirty upper 96 bits that need cleaning if used in assembly.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_88

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function predictDeterministicAddress(
    bytes32 hash,
    bytes32 salt,
    address deployer
) internal pure returns (address predicted)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Array Type Conversion Functions in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Creates functions to cast between uint256 arrays and other data type arrays (address, bool, bytes32) without copying the underlying data.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/dynamicarraylib.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function asAddressArray(uint256[] memory a)
    internal
    pure
    returns (address[] memory result)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Writing Counterfactual Data to Storage Contract in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Function to write data into a storage contract with a salt and return its CREATE2 deterministic address.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/sstore2.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function writeCounterfactual(bytes memory data, bytes32 salt)
    internal
    returns (address pointer)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: WETH Withdrawal Function
DESCRIPTION: Enables users to burn their WETH tokens and receive an equivalent amount of ETH. Takes an amount parameter specifying how much WETH to withdraw.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/weth.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function withdraw(uint256 amount) public virtual
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: WebAuthn Authentication Verification Function
DESCRIPTION: Main verification function for WebAuthn Authentication Assertions that checks authenticator data, client JSON type, challenge, and signature validity.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/webauthn.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function verify(
    bytes memory challenge,
    bool requireUserVerification,
    WebAuthnAuth memory auth,
    bytes32 x,
    bytes32 y
) internal view returns (bool result)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Parsing JSON String in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Implements a function to parse a JSON string and return the root Item. It reverts if the input is not valid JSON according to RFC 8259.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/jsonparserlib.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function parse(string memory s)
    internal
    pure
    returns (Item memory result)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: ERC721 Core Transfer Event Definition
DESCRIPTION: Defines the Transfer event that is emitted when a token is transferred between addresses.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc721.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
event Transfer(
    address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 indexed id
)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: ETH Transfer Error Definition
DESCRIPTION: Custom error for failed ETH transfers
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/safetransferlib.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
error ETHTransferFailed()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Authority and Proxy Operations for EIP7702 in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Provides functions for querying and managing EIP7702 proxies, including delegation, implementation, and admin operations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/accounts/libeip7702.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function delegationOf(address account)
    internal
    view
    returns (address result)

function delegationAndImplementationOf(address account)
    internal
    view
    returns (address delegation, address implementation)

function implementationOf(address target)
    internal
    view
    returns (address result)

function isEIP7702Proxy(address target)
    internal
    view
    returns (bool result)

function proxyInitCode(address initialImplementation, address initialAdmin)
    internal
    pure
    returns (bytes memory)

function deployProxy(address initialImplementation, address initialAdmin)
    internal
    returns (address instance)

function deployProxyDeterministic(
    address initialImplementation,
    address initialAdmin,
    bytes32 salt
) internal returns (address instance)

function proxyAdmin(address proxy) internal view returns (address result)

function changeProxyAdmin(address proxy, address newAdmin) internal

function upgradeProxy(address proxy, address newImplementation) internal
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Scientific Notation Unpacking in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Unpacks a number packed using packSci back into its original value.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/fixedpointmathlib.md#2025-04-16_snippet_20

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function unpackSci(uint256 packed)
    internal
    pure
    returns (uint256 unpacked)
```

TITLE: Upgrading ERC1967 Proxy via Bootstrap
DESCRIPTION: Replaces the implementation at an ERC1967 proxy instance. This is used to upgrade a bootstrapped proxy to point to its actual implementation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_39

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function bootstrapERC1967(address instance, address implementation)
    internal
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Scientific Notation Conversion in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Converts x to scientific notation format, returning the mantissa and exponent separately.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/fixedpointmathlib.md#2025-04-16_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function sci(uint256 x)
    internal
    pure
    returns (uint256 mantissa, uint256 exponent)
```

TITLE: Implementing Dynamic Array Operations in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Creates functions for dynamic array operations such as length, wrap, clear, resize, expand, and append (p) for various data types.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/dynamicarraylib.md#2025-04-16_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function p(DynamicArray memory a, uint256 data)
    internal
    pure
    returns (DynamicArray memory result)
```

TITLE: Creating Deterministic ERC1967 Beacon Proxy with Value in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Function that creates a deterministic minimal ERC1967 beacon proxy with a specified beacon address and salt, while depositing ETH during deployment. Returns a boolean indicating if the proxy was already deployed and the address of the proxy instance. Designed for ERC4337 factories.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_50

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function createDeterministicERC1967BeaconProxy(
    uint256 value,
    address beacon,
    bytes32 salt
) internal returns (bool alreadyDeployed, address instance)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing ERC1155 Batch Token Transfer
DESCRIPTION: Internal function to safely transfer multiple token IDs and amounts between addresses. Includes validation for zero address, array lengths, balances, and smart contract receivers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc1155.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function _safeBatchTransfer(
    address by,
    address from,
    address to,
    uint256[] memory ids,
    uint256[] memory amounts,
    bytes memory data
) internal virtual
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing upgrade Function in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Upgrades a proxy to point to a new implementation. The caller must be the admin of the proxy as recorded in the factory's storage. Accepts ETH value that can be forwarded to the implementation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/erc1967factory.md#2025-04-16_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function upgrade(address proxy, address implementation) public payable
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Core ERC20 Functions
DESCRIPTION: Implementation of core ERC20 token functions including totalSupply, balanceOf, allowance, approve, transfer, and transferFrom.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc20.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function totalSupply() public view virtual returns (uint256 result)
function balanceOf(address owner) public view virtual returns (uint256 result)
function allowance(address owner, address spender) public view virtual returns (uint256 result)
function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) public virtual returns (bool)
function transfer(address to, uint256 amount) public virtual returns (bool)
function transferFrom(address from, address to, uint256 amount) public virtual returns (bool)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Check if uint256 Array is Sorted and Uniquified in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Checks if a uint256 array is strictly ascending (sorted and uniquified). This function is useful for validating the input for set operations that require sorted and uniquified arrays.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libsort.md#2025-04-16_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: Solidity
CODE:
```
function isSortedAndUniquified(uint256[] memory a)
    internal
    pure
    returns (bool result)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Deterministic ERC1967I Beacon Proxy in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Function that creates a deterministic ERC1967I beacon proxy with a specified beacon address and salt. Returns a boolean indicating if the proxy was already deployed and the address of the proxy instance. Designed for ERC4337 factories.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_70

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function createDeterministicERC1967IBeaconProxy(
    address beacon,
    bytes32 salt
) internal returns (bool alreadyDeployed, address instance)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Last IndexOf Function with Offset in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Finds the last occurrence of a needle string within a subject string starting from a specified position.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libstring.md#2025-04-16_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function lastIndexOf(
    string memory subject,
    string memory needle,
    uint256 from
) internal pure returns (uint256)
```

TITLE: Direct Token Transfer Function in ERC6909
DESCRIPTION: Transfers a specified amount of a token ID from the caller to a recipient. Requires the caller to have sufficient balance and emits a Transfer event.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc6909.md#2025-04-16_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function transfer(address to, uint256 id, uint256 amount)
    public
    payable
    virtual
    returns (bool)
```

TITLE: Implementing Batch Execution Function in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: Defines the execute function that handles batch execution of calls. It supports different execution modes and can process single batches or batches of batches.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/accounts/erc7821.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: solidity

```

    public
    payable
    virtual
```

TITLE: Ownership Cycle Detection for ERC6551 Account

CODE:

TITLE: Creating Deterministic ERC1967 Proxy in Solidity
DESCRIPTION: This function creates a deterministic ERC1967 proxy with a specified implementation and salt. It's designed for use in ERC4337 factories and handles existing deployments.

```
    internal
    returns (bool alreadyDeployed, address instance)
```

TITLE: ERC1155 Internal Functions

SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/tokens/erc1155.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

CODE:
```

    internal
    virtual

function _burn(address from, uint256 id, uint256 amount) internal virtual

    virtual

function _safeTransfer(

    address to,

    uint256 amount,
    bytes memory data
```

TITLE: Defining ERC1967Factory Bytecode Constant in Solidity

CODE:

```
    hex""
```

TITLE: Access Control Modifiers
DESCRIPTION: Function modifiers implementing role-based access control checks.
SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/auth/ownableroles.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
modifier onlyRoles(uint256 roles) virtual
```

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
modifier onlyOwnerOrRoles(uint256 roles) virtual
```

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
modifier onlyRolesOrOwner(uint256 roles) virtual
```

SOURCE: https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/main/docs/utils/libclone.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: solidity
CODE:
```
function clone_PUSH0(address implementation)
    internal
    returns (address instance)

function clone_PUSH0(uint256 value, address implementation)
    internal
    returns (address instance)

function cloneDeterministic_PUSH0(address implementation, bytes32 salt)
    internal
    returns (address instance)

function cloneDeterministic_PUSH0(
    uint256 value,
    address implementation,
    bytes32 salt
) internal returns (address instance)

function initCode_PUSH0(address implementation)
    internal
    pure
    returns (bytes memory c)

function initCodeHash_PUSH0(address implementation)
    internal
    pure
    returns (bytes32 hash)

function predictDeterministicAddress_PUSH0(
    address implementation,
    bytes32 salt,
    address deployer
) internal pure returns (address predicted)
```
